name: Cum On Bus
description:
Get ready for an unforgettable adult gaming experience with "Cum On Bus"!

Your goal is to unlock all the steamy scenes by mastering the art of pleasure through our mini-game mechanics. Control a sleeping female on a bus and make her cum to unlock the next level.

But be warned, your success depends on your skills and performance. You must work hard and stay consistent by completing the mini-games and upgrading your characteristics to get rewarded.

With animated 3D characters and 3D backgrounds "Cum On Bus" is designed to provide an immersive and exciting gaming experience. So, what are you waiting for? Hop on board and cum on the bus!
